sourcesContent: import FuseHighlight from '@fuse/core/FuseHighlight'; import Typography from '@mui/material/Typography'; function HerokuNotesDoc() { return ( <> HEROKU Notes You may encounter some issues if you want to deploy fuse-react to heroku, here is the solution: Use the{' '} mars/create-react-app {' '} buildpack: {` heroku buildpacks:set mars/create-react-app `} the next build will be created with this official pack. Install devDependencies: {` heroku config:set NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false `} Push skeleton branch to master of heroku {` git push heroku skeleton:master `} ); } export default HerokuNotesDoc;
